CALICE::PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor

CALICE::PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor Class Reference

Processor which calulates the pedestals from pedestal events and subtracts these values from following non-pedestal events. More...

Detailed Description

Processor which calulates the pedestals from pedestal events and subtracts these values from following non-pedestal events.
